mapper.select:
select
from goods where is_recommend = 1 and is_delete=0 and is_shelves=1 order by sort,id

select
from goods where is_delete=0 and is_shelves=1 limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize} order by sort,id

select
from goods
goods_name like "%${keyword}%"
and is_delete=0 and is_shelves=1 order by sort,id limit ${pageNo},${pageSize}

select count(*) from goods
goods_name like "%${keyword}%"
and is_delete=0 and is_shelves=1 order by sort,id

select
from goods
goods_name like "%${keyword}%"
and category_id=${categoryId} and is_delete=0 and is_shelves=1 order by sort,id limit ${pageNo},${pageSize}

select count(*) from goods
goods_name like "%${keyword}%"
and category_id=${categoryId} and is_delete=0 and is_shelves=1 order by sort,id
